A Phased Roadmap to AI-Driven Consulting.

The following is a phased roadmap outlining the key capabilities our consultants will develop, and the measurable AI impact associated with each.

Near-Term (0–6 months)

Research & Analysis

Automated data gathering, synthesis, and summarisation. Impact: Reduce research cycles by 70%.

Proposal Development

AI-assisted content generation and customisation. Impact: 80% faster proposal creation.

Delivery Feasibility

Predictive modelling pre-pitch. Impact: Improved bid selectivity and win rate.

Mid-Term (6–18 months)

Dynamic Team Assembly

AI matches consultants to projects based on capability graphs. Impact: Faster, more precise staffing
